title: How to Change Names in Team Fortress 2

steps.headline: Locate the Steam icon.
steps.description: This is most likely to be on your desktop. If not, it is in your "all programs" list. TF2 cannot run without Steam, so it is definitely on your computer somewhere.

steps.headline: Once located, click on the icon.
At the top of Steam, there are four sections in capital letters: STORE, LIBRARY, COMMUNITY, and your current profile name (which is your TF2 name).
steps.description: Click on your current name (This is to the right of COMMUNITY).

steps.headline: Once you click on this, look at the "Actions" box to the right.
steps.description: Under this is a link that says "Edit my Profile". Click this link.

steps.headline: Next to profile name is an editable box which currently has your name in it.
steps.description: Change this name to whatever you want and click save at the bottom. Your profile name automatically becomes your TF2 username.

text: Locate the Steam icon. This is most likely to be on your desktop. If not, it is in your "all programs" list. TF2 cannot run without Steam, so it is definitely on your computer somewhere. Once located, click on the icon. The Steam "store" screen appears. At the top of Steam, there are four sections in capital letters: STORE, LIBRARY, COMMUNITY, and your current profile name (which is your TF2 name). Click on your current name (This is to the right of COMMUNITY). Once you click on this, look at the "Actions" box to the right. Under this is a link that says "Edit my Profile". Click this link. Next to profile name is an editable box which currently has your name in it. Change this name to whatever you want and click save at the bottom. Your profile name automatically becomes your TF2 username.
